# STREAMING::LOAD_GLOBAL_WATER_FILE

## Summary
Loads selected water file: 0=main V map, 1=Island Heist DLC

## Parameters
* **INT** waterId

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
0 - default
1 - HeistIsland
